resources.string: HeadApp will help encourage you on your life journey whether it\’s goals or daily inspirations. By using the power of the spoken word.
You can program HeadApp to motivate inspire, or help you achieve that goal you\’ve always wanted.
Simply fill HeadApp with encouraging messages that aim towards your daily inspirations or desired goals. And if you don\’t want them anymore just swipe them away and write new ones.
HeadApp will deliver the messages to you at the right moment so you can always be on track of what is really important! So what are you waiting for LET\’S GET STARTED!! .
Write some inspiraional messages and tap the start button!
Set the tone of HeadApp behaviour, the more intense the more help you get.
How would you like to be called by.
Select a typeface for your message cards.
Set it on if you want your cards to display multicolor backgrounds.
Amatic, Lobster and Ostrich font\'s under SIL OPEN FONT LICENSE Version 1.1.

string-array.name: mensajes_precargados
string-array.item: Begin each day with a grateful heart.
Begin each day with a grateful heart.
Dream it. Believe it. Achieve it.
You are what you say! Use the power of the spoken word.
Don\’t stress! Do your best! Forget the rest!
A lion doesn\’t lose sleep over the opinion of sheep.
